snippet.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate - Official v1.5 Trailer
snippet.description:
Shotgun King just received a big content update, adding 40+ new cards, new game mechanics, new enemy AI, new achievements and more!

Available now for Windows, Mac and Linux!

♟️ Get Shotgun King on Steam: https://s.team/a/1972440
🏰 Get Shotgun King on Itch: https://punkcake.itch.io/shotgun-king
👑 Subscribe to Punkcake and get a new game every month: https://www.patreon.com/punkcake

🕵️‍♀️ Presskit: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1urq4gmn6zGNT2GR2i8Vo6TVFQKiOJ3ur?usp=drive_link

💬 Join our community on Discord: https://discord.gg/dpQx647USm
🦚 Follow us on X: https://x.com/PUNKCAKE_delice
